# insertSections(_:beforeSection:)

**Instance Method**

Inserts the provided sections immediately before the section with the specified identifier in the snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func insertSections(_ identifiers: [SectionIdentifierType], beforeSection toIdentifier: SectionIdentifierType)
```

## Parameters

- **identifiers**: The array of identifiers corresponding to the sections to add to the snapshot.
- **toIdentifier**: The identifier of the section before which to insert the new sections.

## Inserting items and sections

- **insertItems(_:afterItem:)**: Inserts the provided items immediately after the item with the specified identifier in the snapshot.
- **insertItems(_:beforeItem:)**: Inserts the provided items immediately before the item with the specified identifier in the snapshot.
- **insertSections(_:afterSection:)**: Inserts the provided sections immediately after the section with the specified identifier in the snapshot.
